data.meta_description: CufitecÂ® is an original anti-viral and anti-bacterial technology that was developed by NBC Meshtec and utilizes nanoparticles of a monovalent copper compound. It can be processed for use on a wide range of base materials, and can be used in materials such as non-woven fabrics and other fabrics, films, plastics, and paints. NBC Meshtec Inc. is a company that manufactures and supplies mesh technology-based functional materials, such as mesh, filters, and mesh cloth for screen printing, to a wide variety of industries including the automobile, household appliance, and medical equipment industries.
data.text:
Cufitec® is an anti-viral and anti-bacterial technology that utilizes nanoparticles of a monovalent copper compound.

It can be processed for use in a variety of materials, and used in wide range of applications.

We are surrounded by countless viruses and bacteria.

While some of these microorganisms are beneficial, others are threats to humans, plants, and animals, and we need to take steps to protect ourselves from them.

NBC Meshtec developed the technology called Cufitec® in order to provide clean, safe, and comfortable environments to our customers, and to protect them against the invisible threats of viruses and bacteria.
